resources:
// Application Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer HHS Moodle Used permission \"Access storage\" permission:
• Lists: creating and storing.
• Backup: backup and restore databases.
• Downloads: save downloads on the sd-card.
• Screenshots: save screenshots of a website on the sd-card.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> Grant permission\". Share screenshot using: Share link using: Choose file with: splashScreen Attachment My Moodle Please wait … Closing app. // Moodle Dashboard Profile Calendar Ratings Notifications Settings School homepage Web search Moodle Check Clock // About About HHS Moodle Developer Used open source libraries Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Used to build the intro screen. Used to encrypt pin (for app protection). Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons. A powerful library for Android to display media files. Library to choose or make pictures. // IntroScreen HHS Moodle Thanks for choosing HHS Moodle. Please read the following introduction carefully. You can reach all important functions by swiping from the left to the middle of your screen. Help Over the menu you can reach a help dialog on every screen. Security All databases and your login data are decrypted. Create a pin to protect the app against unwanted usage. Login Enter your Moodle login data on the next screen. You will be logged in automatically in future. You can edit your login data in the settings. // Login Username Password Please enter username and password. If this does not work: edit your login data in the settings. This dialog will disappear, when you are successfully logged in. Automatic login // Tab - Titles Bookmarks Notes Browser Files title date icon notification attachment // Menu Items Share website Share screenshot Share link as text Open link in external browser Copy link to clipboard Save screenshot Settings Add bookmark Help Tools Exit app Configure Add entry All of them … Sort entries Sort by title Sort by icon Sort by Attachment Sort by notification Sort by extension Search Search in titles Search in content Search in URLs Search in attachments Search in courses Search in subjects Search for file extension // Context Menu Link successfully copied Saving image as: // Settings App settings Permissions | About Security Login data (Moodle) Please enter your Moodle username and password to get automatically logged in. Main screen Which tab should be displayed as default on the main screen? About Learn more about the app (changelog, license, used libraries, …). Pin (App access) Set a pin to protect app against unwanted access. Only use numbers. Let empty, if you do not want to protect the app (own risk). Problems? Send me a mail. Backup Backup and restore your databases (notes, bookmarks, …). A new backup overwrites the old one. You can also delete an existing database. Automatic backup Always backup all databases (Todo, bookmarks, …), when leaving the app. Notification Receive a notification after restarting the phone, which allows to search fast for important todo lists. Restore Delete Data Tools Use advanced tools within \"HHS Moodle\": notes, todo-lists, counter and some more. They will also be reachable within the navigation drawer. // Snackbar OK Cancel Never show Downloading file: Do you want to download: Download completed. Open folder manager? Permissions granted? Uuups. Wrong password. Backup failed. Restore failed. Failed to create screenshot. Please install an app to perform action. Title already exists. There\'s no entry in the list. Can not save entry. Content added. Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. Please choose text file. Open settings This overwrites the actual backup, which gets lost. This overwrites the actual database. Current data will be lost. Done! An error occurred! This delete the actual database. Current data will be lost. Something todo? CLick to check. If nothing happens - nothing to do! // Bookmarks Delete entry Adding entry. Successfully set as favorite. You can only choose one favorite. Edit title Create note // Notes Entry will be removed. OK? Edit note Share note using: Attachment Title Content + Content Gallery Camera // Password Pin (only numbers) Pin forgotten? Do you want to delete all user data (also login data, saved bookmarks, notes, …) to reset your app pin? The application will close. //File chooser Files Share Delete Choose attachment // Grade 100 Max. credits Please enter maximal credits. Grades calculation Percent Credits Grade // Number Random generator Error reading file. Random number Enter number … First enter a number … … then press \"ok\". Edit entry Please enter data to the list. Create random list // ToDo Todo From course list Custom title New entry … Create todo list Entry deleted Restore? Share entry Paste actual date Paste actual time Please enter an item first. // CourseList Course lists From text file + course members // Subjects Red Pink Purple Blue Teal Green Lime Yellow Orange Brown Grey // Count Counter Create counter
